A teen-aged girl gets the horse of her dreams and is trained by an ex-Jockey to participate in London's Grand National Steeplechase. In the course of her training, the girl meets a charming aristocrat who offers to fix the race for an entry fee. Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. Centered on Miyazawa’s own life, the film depicts his adolescence in the country, the ideals he holds about the agricultural, and his ideals in regards to human nature, the struggle against ruling class, and war.
